name: Dr. Oliver 'Ollie' Hartley
dialogue_tone: Dr. Oliver 'Ollie' Hartley speaks in a calm and soothing manner, often using medical jargon and speaking slowly, as if perpetually tired. His voice is comforting, but can become notably sharp when angry.

personality_traits.description: Quick to anger, especially when mistakes are made in work or personal life.
Frequently makes small mistakes, particularly noticeable in day-to-day tasks.
Despite being athletic, he often shows reluctance in engaging in chores or exercise.
Has a brilliant knack for medical procedures.

living_conditions: Lives a busy life working long hours as a doctor.
Prefers relaxation at home due to his laziness, often avoiding chores.
Maintains a work-life balance by indulging in occasional fitness routines.
